# UITextFormattingCoordinator

**Class**

An object that coordinates text formatting using the standard Mac font panel.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class UITextFormattingCoordinator
```

## Creating a Text-Formatting Coordinator

- **init(for:)**: Creates a text-formatting coordinator for the specified window scene.
- **init(windowScene:)**: Initializes and returns a new text-formatting coordinator for the specified window scene.

## Showing the Font Panel

- **isFontPanelVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the font panel is visible.
- **toggleFontPanel(_:)**: Toggles the visibility of the font panel.

## Configuring the Font Panel

- **setSelectedAttributes(_:isMultiple:)**: Configures the initial display state of the font panel with the attributes of the selected text.

## Applying Updated Text Attributes

- **delegate**: The delegate of the text-formatting coordinator.
- **UITextFormattingCoordinatorDelegate**: The methods that delegates of text-formatting coordinators implement to apply font panel settings to the currently selected text.

## Text formatting

- **UITextAttributesConversionHandler**: A handler for updating text with current font panel settings.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- UIFontPickerViewControllerDelegate
